data.text: Could the COVID-19 pandemic have less of an economic impact than previously feared?

data.title: Mastercard About To Put More Money In Your Pocket
data.text: On 4/8/20, Mastercard will trade ex-dividend, for its quarterly dividend of $0.40, payable on 5/8/20. As a percentage of MA's recent stock price of $251.67, this dividend works out to approximately 0.16%.
